NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
An update on graduation from NCS with The Challenge
Dear Parent or Guardian of {!Contact.Name},
The South Birmingham NCS with The Challenge Graduation has now been re- scheduled for Saturday 6th December. Please hold the date and more details will be posted out to you shortly.
Thank you for your patience with this, I hope you will understand that it has been difficult to find a suitable venue at such short notice but we now look forward celebrating with you at your NCS graduation ceremony.
Yours sincerely,
The Challenge
